techmeme.title: How the US government launched a revamped online system in September 2024 to simplify passport renewal, which is already handling nearly 50% of all renewals (Ben Cohen/Wall Street Journal)

A look at the US Secret Service's GIOC, which sources say helped seize ~$400M in digital assets over the past decade through crypto scam investigations globally (Myles Miller/Bloomberg)
Q&A with British Library CEO Rebecca Lawrence on dealing with the aftermath of a major October 2023 cyberattack, AI scraping, AI for text analysis, and more (Mishal Husain/Bloomberg)
